pkgmetadata.longdescription: # betfair_parserA simple and fast betfair parser, built with [msgspec](https://github.com/jcrist/msgspec).### ReleasingReleases are published automatically when a tag is pushed to GitHub.```# Set next version numberexport RELEASE=x.x.x# Create tagsgit commit --allow-empty -m "Release $RELEASE"git tag -a $RELEASE -m "Version $RELEASE"# Pushgit push upstream --tags```
